name: Creative Shock

rule.description: Once Creative Shock starts to resolve, players can't respond to its effects. If a player wants to respond to the potential 2 damage Creative Shock can deal, it must be responded to before Creative Shock starts resolving (before its controller draws two cards).

effect:

effect:
Deal **LV** damage to target unit. *(**LV** refers to your champion's level.)*

[Class Bonus] You may banish two cards at random from your memory. If you do, draw two cards. *(Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)*

effect:
Allies you control get +1 [POWER] and +1 [LIFE].

***Upkeep*** — At the beginning of your recollection phase, if you control four or fewer other domains, sacrifice CARDNAME.
effect_raw:
Allies you control get +1 POWER and +1 LIFE.

Upkeep — At the beginning of your recollection phase, if you control four or fewer other domains, sacrifice Exalted Dorumegian Throne.
flavor: Humanity's ascension gilded in iron, onyx, and gold.
name: Exalted Dorumegian Throne
effect_html: Allies you control get +1 and +1.Upkeep — At the beginning of your recollection phase, if you control four or fewer other domains, sacrifice Exalted Dorumegian Throne.

effect: **Banish CARDNAME:** Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a fire element champion.
effect_raw: Banish Fire Resonance Bauble: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a fire element champion.
flavor: Captured, perhaps, but never tamed. This spirit's owner must always err on the side of caution.
name: Fire Resonance Bauble
effect_html: Banish Fire Resonance Bauble: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a fire element champion.

effect:
**Imbue 2**

At the beginning of your recollection phase, if CARDNAME is **imbued**, target player puts the top card of their deck into their graveyard.

**Reservable** *(While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.)*

Imbue 2

At the beginning of your recollection phase, if Fractal of Rain is imbued, target player puts the top card of their deck into their graveyard.

Reservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.)

rule.description: You reserve the cards face up. You do not place them face down and then 'reveal' them.

effect_html: Imbue 2At the beginning of your recollection phase, if Fractal of Rain is imbued, target player puts the top card of their deck into their graveyard.Reservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.)

editions.flavor: Deep in Wonderland lies a cove of ice, where legends speak of a gryphon and turtle's waltz.
"Praying for peace won't end a war. Fighting for what you believe in will."
"Praying for peace won't end a war. Fighting for what you believe in will."

effect: **Negate** target card activation unless its controller pays (2). Banish the card that had its activation **negated** this way.
effect_raw: Negate target card activation unless its controller pays (2). Banish the card that had its activation negated this way.
flavor: "O'Lumina who shelters us, bind those who seek us harm in frost. Grant us peace under your blessing."
name: Frostbind

rule.description: If Frostbind negates an attack card, the combat phase never gets to begin. This means that On Attack effects will not trigger. The attacker remains rested if resting that unit was an additional cost of that attack card.
The (2) in Frostbind's negate condition is a reserve cost, and can be paid by resting objects with reservable.

effect_html: Negate target card activation unless its controller pays 2. Banish the card that had its activation negated this way.

editions.flavor: "The emperor is dead! The throne sits empty!"
The duty of delivering time-sensitive parcels is given to the fleet of foot.

effect:
***Upkeep*** — Whenever you materialize a card, sacrifice Varuck.

Damage dealt by fire element sources you control can't be prevented.
effect_raw:
Upkeep — Whenever you materialize a card, sacrifice Varuck.

Damage dealt by fire element sources you control can't be prevented.
flavor: Once decrepit, now ablaze with new blood.
name: Varuck, Smoldering Spire

rule.description: Champions are considered to be of each element as cards that exists in their lineage. Damage from a fire element champion's attacks becomes unpreventable under the effects of Varuck.

effect_html: Upkeep — Whenever you materialize a card, sacrifice Varuck.Damage dealt by fire element sources you control can't be prevented.

effect: **Banish CARDNAME:** Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a water element champion.
effect_raw: Banish Water Resonance Bauble: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a water element champion.
flavor: Torrents crash and turn along the edges of this orb, waiting for their inevitable release.
name: Water Resonance Bauble
effect_html: Banish Water Resonance Bauble: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a water element champion.

effect: **Banish CARDNAME:** Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a wind element champion.
effect_raw: Banish Wind Resonance Bauble: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a wind element champion.
flavor: A spirit of wind sleeps within this bauble. Perhaps it will grant blessings once it wakes.
name: Wind Resonance Bauble
effect_html: Banish Wind Resonance Bauble: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls a wind element champion.

editions.flavor: Tossing and turning winds delay even the most well-set plans. Few are able to avoid the churning winds of fate.

effect: If damage would be dealt to your champion this turn, prevent 2 of that damage. Your champion becomes **distant**. Then you may pay (2). If you do, allies you control also become **distant**.

flavor: The gliding shadows obfuscate and disorientate.
name: False Step
effect_html: If damage would be dealt to your champion this turn, prevent 2 of that damage. Your champion becomes distant. Then you may pay 2. If you do, allies you control also become distant.
